# topical-matcher

UDC/IAB document classification toolkit.

## Status

**Coming soon** - Package is under development.

## Planned Features

- Document classification using UDC 3-level hierarchy
- Multiple classifier strategies
- Profile-to-document matching
- Sparse vector output
